name: Bread and Butter 🍞🔥
description:
DIRECTIONS

Is being a great baker bread and butter? Maybe!  

Make the perfect bread and see how much money you can gather. 

TEAM

  • Markus Unger (Developer and Designer) -> Twitter | Website
  • Ernani Rocha (Designer and Artist) -> Twitter

MUSIC

  • Space Fox -> Itch.io

CREDITS

This game was build during 3 days of the Mini 94: Baking with 2 Buttons Limitation.

Please, leave feedback below! Hope you have fun! 🥳
